creator: mark@etango.com
text:
The server's default web.xml has some grammer and spelling errors in it (namely 
in the comments pertaining to the JSP servlet).

creator: mark@etango.com
text:
Created attachment 6436
patch to the web.xml

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This has been fixed along with a number of similar grammar errors in both TC4 
and TC5.
Thanks for the patch.
